post.body: ME!!! Advice about partying?? You OK today????
Actually wish I had the clothes to ski in it was -9 coming over the hill last night.. bring warm stuff Bro
Wish I had time to ski, just here for 1 day then back over the hill to Denver then to San Fran... peace Bro
Bro the Belly Up Bar has had some incredible acts play there. Can't believe the photos on the walls, Cant believe I've never been.
Hillbilly limo is a 4 door pick up. Ain't they teach-en ya nothen yet?
Bro Aspen is crazy beautiful... u been up this way before?
had...the word was had
ad to go anyway.... now we're there
Wait I think there may be 1 or 2 down by where I live @ and a couple of hillbilly limo's in the mountains somewhere. I'll look ;0)
NO TAXI'S IN ARKANSAS, GET USE TO IT...
OK thanks... all is good, happy holidays to you... peace out
Happy Holidaze my brother....
Oh it's all true... Need a mask for Xmas, forgot to ask Santa
Hanging out in Denver, Colorado....
I think people just rent skis here and carry them around on their shoulders to look cool. Same ones walking around all day with their skis.
Aspen is crazy beautiful...12 degrees... down to -9 on the hill to get here... The Belly Up Bar... party time
OMG!! all flights are on time... It's a good thing Im an irish guy, well most days... now to get thru the snow storm between here and aspen
Waiting on flights @ the Denver Airport... Could be here the rest of my life.. Waiting, Waiting, Waiting anyone seen my flights??
MERRY CHRISTMAS EVERYONE FROM ATOP THE MOUNTAINS OF COLORADO 10,000+ FEET UP.....
Driving up a 8000 dr mountain listening to Stairway to heaven...../:
